title: Create Environment Configuration
description: Set up a complete environment configuration system for a Flutter app.
instructions: Create an AppConfig class that supports dev, staging, and prod environments. Include API URL, app name, logging toggle, analytics toggle, and a feature flag for 'new_dashboard'. Initialize from dart-define values and provide convenient getters.

hints.text: Use String.fromEnvironment() and bool.fromEnvironment() to read compile-time constants
Use a switch statement on the environment name to configure different defaults per flavor
Consider making feature flags always true in dev for easier testing

commonMistakes.mistake: Using environment variables instead of const fromEnvironment
commonMistakes.consequence: Values won't be available at compile time and will always be default
commonMistakes.correction: Use String.fromEnvironment() which reads --dart-define values at compile time

commonMistakes.consequence: App crashes or uses empty strings for URLs
commonMistakes.correction: Provide sensible defaults with the defaultValue parameter
